title: New: Yumi Zouma – The Brae
content:
Having appeared briefly last year with their debut track A Long Walk Home for Parted Lovers, a song that disappeared within hours of materialising online, New Zealand group Yumi Zouma have returned, announcing a release through Cascine.

Their self-titled EP will drop 11 Feb, and lead single The Brae lifted from the EP is swoon worthy dream pop personified. With a riff that would have Teenage Fanclub turning green, it’s a fantastic way to re-announce their arrival. Stream it below, and grab the EP from Cascine. (Premiered on GvB)
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
